title: Woolly star plants need catastrophes to live

title_detail.value: Woolly star plants need catastrophes to live

summary: The endangered Santa Ana Woolly Star depends on catastrophic floods. Thanks to a huge dam, natural floods are now nonexistent in its home turf. Researchers use different soil treatments mimicking flood effects in its preferred habitat, exploring the effectiveness of each towards plant survival.
